::Shredder::

Turning, Shredder continues firing on Wrath, almost falling as shots hit him. 
He glances at Singtra for a moment. Why was he helping her? Ussually, he was 
the sort of bot to sit and watch bots killing each other, or help them kill, 
unless there was something to his advantage. He sruggs. Too late to pull back 
now anyways.

Shredder keeps firing at Wrath, wondering if a grenade would do too much 
damage on the other bots in the vicinity.
